page_content:
Capgemini UK plc

IBM Mainframe Services

Multi-tenant Bureau style IBM mainframe service providing a highly available platform for hosting within secure data centres. Offering features a state of the art managed platform to cater for a wide variety of mainframe workloads and technologies, with optional technology and operational support services.

Features

  • Flexible resource units in set priced increments
  • Highly scalable with no upper limit
  • Platform, storage, backup and local networking services included
  • IBM licensed software provided by Capgemini
  • Numerous upgrade options for each standard resource unit
  • Onshore/offshore model for maximum flexibility
  • Optional technical and operational support services
  • Customisation of standard systems and service management
  • Transparent monthly billing and service reporting cycle
  • Assured and secured delivery from Capgemini’s global mainframe experts

Benefits

  • Cost flexibility – move from CAPEX to OPEX
  • Utility pricing, scale up and down on demand
  • Scale of economy from a multi-tenant bureau service
  • Highly available service to minimise business disruption
  • Discrete and secure data hosting facilities
  • Able to support workloads of the future i.e. Linux
  • Options for onshore and offshore delivery
  • Market ready for future application delivery e.g. Cloud aaS
  • Addresses the skills gap associated with niche technology
  • Predictable and transparent offering to meet Government needs

Pricing

£54474.80 per server per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Month
